biotools.summary: Scan several protein sequences or a whole genome (all ORFs) against HAMAP family profiles. Sequences that match HAMAP profiles will be annotated in the UniProtKB format by the associated annotation rules.

bioschemas.name: HAMAP-Scan
bioschemas.summary: Scan several protein sequences or a whole genome (all ORFs) against HAMAP family profiles. Sequences that match HAMAP profiles will be annotated in the UniProtKB format by the associated annotation rules.
